All Classes

Class Summary 
Class Description
Actor
this class represents the actors/characters/objects/images that will appear inside the game
ActorTest
this is a JUnit test to test Actor class's subclasses by using JUnit 4
Animal
this class represents the characters/animals of the game which is the frog
BackgroundImage
this class is to set the images that needed in the game
Digit
this class represents the digit that appears in the top right screen to indicate the score
End
this class represents the destinations of the animal(frog)
Fly
this class represents the fly with the destination
GameLife
this class represents the game life
Level1
this class represents Level 1 of the game this class is to add all the needed things into level 1's scene
Level2
this class represents Level 2 of the game this class is to add all the needed things into level 2's scene This level includes all objects in level 1 and the newly added Game Life
Level3
this class represents Level 3 of the game this class is to add all the needed things into level 3's scene This level includes all objects in level 2 and the newly added Fly
Level4
this class represents Level 4 of the game this class is to add all the needed things into level 4's scene This level includes all objects in level 3 and the newly added Snake
Level5
this class represents Level 5 of the game this class is to add all the needed things into level 5's scene This level includes all objects in level 4, but their speed has changed more faster
Log
this class represents the log object
Main  
Main  
MyStage
this class represents the stage and background music of the game
Obstacle
this class represents the obstacle and its action
ScoreList
this class represents the ending score list it is to save and read the score for each round into/from a file
ScoreListTest
this is a JUnit test to test the ScoreList class by using JUnit 4
Snake
this class represents the actor snake
StartEndScreen
this class represents the starting and ending scene for the game
Turtle
this class represents the turtle
WetTurtle
this class represents the wet turtle
World
this class represents the game world it can add/remove the actors to the world and make the actor starts its action/animation
